Record.ParentTerm: Ectopic Hormone Secretion Syndromes Associated with Neoplasia
Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Syndrome/Neoplastic Syndrome/Ectopic Hormone Secretion Syndromes Associated with Neoplasia/Inappropriate Antidiuretic Hormone Secretion Syndrome
Record.BroaderTerm: Ectopic Hormone Secretion Syndromes Associated with Neoplasia
Record.Synonym: Syndrome of Inappropriate Antidiuretic Hormone Secretion
Record.Description: A syndrome characterized by abnormal secretion of antidiuretic hormone in conjunction with neoplastic growth occurring anywhere in the body.
